byline.original: By BENJAMIN HOFFMAN and KEN PLUTNICKI

abstract: The Yankees have played at home in a decisive Game 5 of the division series only one other time since 1995 -- in 2001, when they beat the A's.
snippet: The Yankees have played at home in a decisive Game 5 of the division series only one other time since 1995 -- in 2001, when they beat the A's.

headline.main: Decisive Game 5 at Stadium Calls to Mind a 2001 Series
